
                            
                            <div class="xdg"><p>北京建行每月领更新，一般刚登录北京建行的，在搜索关键词，是搜索不出来，至少要主页显示“约惠北京”的菜单，这时能搜索出来！<br><br><a target="_blank" href="https://mobile.ccb.com/e_report/outlink/index.html?link_id=7448506912cb48f48473c7a9ae80c1ea&amp;UTM_SOURCE=shenbixiu&amp;UTM_CAMPAIGN=14844_gda2q9_">https://mobile.ccb.com/e_report/outlink/index.html?link_i…</a>北京-支付购立减金8元202502<br><br><br><br><a target="_blank" href="https://event.ccbft.com/e/ccb_gjb/peqIhq40V4VwA4HCvPdD-Q?__dmsp_sharemdid=ZHCMD_e0cfbd3e-4011-4bd3-ad76-9fca2c52a641&amp;inviteUserId=35473813761379532809262&amp;inviteActivityCode=AP110202501171341496&amp;urlType=0&amp;isCollection=0">https://event.ccbft.com/e/ccb_gjb/peqIhq40V4VwA4HCvPdD-Q?…</a>北京-支付购5元立减金202502<br><br><br><br><br><a target="_blank" href="https://mobile.ccb.com/e_report/outlink/index.html?link_id=d052c975393544ad8c64458a8fe60163&amp;UTM_SOURCE=shenbixiu&amp;UTM_CAMPAIGN=14848_ps4hef_">https://mobile.ccb.com/e_report/outlink/index.html?link_i…</a>北京-支付购立减金3元202502(修正参数）</p></div>
